snippet: A man, 67, was killed and his wife was seriously wounded during a robbery Sunday night; the police said they had a suspect in custody.
abstract: Dante Viggiano is arrested and charged with fatally stabbing Peter Gialluisi and seriously injuring his wife in a home invasion on Staten Island.
lead_paragraph: A man, 67, was killed and his wife was seriously wounded during a robbery Sunday night; the police said they had a suspect in custody.

headline.main: Man, 20, Is Charged With Fatal Stabbing in S. I. Home Invasion
headline.print_headline: Man, 20, Is Charged With Fatal Stabbing in S. I. Home Invasion
